search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Memberstack (memberstack.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Memberstack is: [https://www.memberstack.com/pricing](https://www.memberstack.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

[Learn More](https://docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/13707369368987#young-professionals)

30-Day Money Back Guarantee
---------------------------

If you're not 100% satisfied we will refund 100% your last payment. Which doesn't happen often.

About Memberstack

Who is Memberstack for?

Companies building with [Stripe](https://www.memberstack.com/features/stripe-integration), [Webflow](https://www.memberstack.com/with/react), and/or [React](https://www.memberstack.com/with/webflow).  
‍  
Companies like American Airlines, Slack, Entreprenuer.com, and Smart Passive Income use Memberstack to serve millions of members every single day.  
‍  
And top Webflow agencies like [Relume](https://www.memberstack.com/showcase/how-we-built-relume-library), Finsweet, Flowbase, Refokus, Whiteboard, and Brandweld use Memberstack to build beautiful client projects with user [auth](https://www.memberstack.com/features#authentication), [gated content](https://www.memberstack.com/features/gate-content), and [Stripe payments](https://www.memberstack.com/features/stripe-integration). It’s free until you’re ready to go live.

What is Memberstack & what are the main features?

Does Memberstack have an API?

Can I talk to someone about my product or idea?

Yes, of course! Please post in our [Community](https://www.memberstack.com/slack) — we'd love to hear what you're working on and how we can help.

Billing & Pricing

Does Memberstack have a free trial?

Yes, absolutely! All of Memberstack's features are **free to try (no credit card)** on a test site for an **unlimited amount of time**. This means that you can take the time you need to set up Memberstack fully in test mode, and only pay when your website is ready to accept real members.

How do the member limits work?

We count the total number of [Live](https://docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/7595262385819-Managing-Test-Mode-and-Live-Mode) members. This includes all free and paying members. And excludes any test mode members.

You will receive an email when you are 90% of the way to your current member limit.  
‍  
When you reach 100% on the [Basic and Professional plans](https://memberstack.webflow.io/pricing) we will automatically upgrade your account to the next tier. If you are on the Business or Established plans we will automatically increase your member limit by 20,000 to avoid interruptions.

What are transaction fees and when do they apply?

We define a **transaction** as whenever a member pays to sign up on your website through Memberstack. A **transaction fee** is a service fee based on a given percentage of each transaction.

If you only have free members, then the transaction fees _do not_ apply to you. If you do require your members to pay during signup, then Memberstack charges a flat transaction fee based on your plan.

Please note that Memberstack's transaction fees do not include the fees that Stripe charges.

How do I receive the money from the sales on my Website?

Memberstack uses [Stripe](https://stripe.com/) to process payments securely on our users' websites and for payouts. Money you earn on your website is directly and securely transferred to your bank account via Stripe.

Does Memberstack offer any discounts for non-profits?

As a mission-driven organization, we're happy to support non-profits with a 50% discount for 12 months — please fill out this form with details on your non-profit to activate it: [www.memberstack.com/nonprofit](https://www.memberstack.com/nonprofit).

Does Memberstack offer any discounts for students and young professionals?

We believe in empowering young professionals as they work their way through school or embark on their careers.

**If you are between the ages of 18 and 22, you can receive a 100% discount on our services.  
**  
Please upload proof of age as part of your application.

Apply now through our [Young Professionals Discount Application Form](https://www.memberstack.com/student).

Does Memberstack offer any discounts for startups?

As a startup, we know how hard it can be to make purchasing decisions - especially when the cost is a % of your revenue. This is why **we offer a special discount for those that have attended a startup program like Y Combinator, 500 Startups, or Launch and raised less than $1 million in funding.**

Apply now through our [Startup Discount Application Form](https://www.memberstack.com/startups).

Does Memberstack have a refund policy?

**Yes…** If you have paid for a yearly or a monthly plan in the last 30-days you are entitled to a prorated refund. If you’re not happy with Memberstack, let us know and we will make things right! If you’re still not happy.**  
PS…** You must request a refund with-in 45-days of upgrading to be eligible.**PPS…** Please contact us if you have any concerns. We’ll do everything in our power to make things right!

Data & Security

Does Memberstack have a privacy policy & security policy?

Are my members' emails and passwords secured by Memberstack?

Yes. Data stored in Memberstack about your members is secured using industry best practices — this includes member emails, passwords and metadata. We force [HTTPS](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/ssl/what-is-https/) so that data between your website and our servers is **always encrypted**. Data stored in our database is also encrypted at rest. We also take regular automated backups in order to stay safe.

We are an official Stripe Partner to process payments — so **we do not have access to and do not store any financial information**.

Does Memberstack access or store any of my members' financial information?

Memberstack uses [Stripe](https://www.memberstack.com/features/stripe-integration) to process payments — we are an Official Stripe Partner. **We do not have access to and do not store any financial information about our customer's members.**

Can I use Memberstack to gate highly sensitive information?

Most Memberstack features gate content on the front-end - meaning, a determined person with the right knowledge will be able to get around our content gating. This applies to pages/elements that you build in Webflow, and then gate using Memberstack.

However, **there are various ways to keep information secure, like:  
‍**  
**1\. Hosted Content:** Using our hosted content feature, you can keep text-based content (including links & HTML) stored inside of Memberstack, and it is not served to the user unless they have been authenticated.  
**2\. Member JSON & Metadata:** This member-specific information is added by the member and lives inside Memberstack. The only person who should be able to access it is the owner of the account, and the account admin.

Security is a tricky and nuanced topic - if you're unsure if Memberstack's security is a good fit for your use case, [please send a message in our Slack channel](https://www.memberstack.com/slack) to get advice and recommendations from the community, our team, and our experts.

Is Memberstack GDPR compliant?

**Yes** — We are committed to helping our customers and users understand and, where applicable, comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

In addition to strengthening and standardizing user data privacy across jurisdictions, GDPR introduce additional obligations on all organizations that handle personal data.

[On this page, we explain how Memberstack complies with GDPR.](https://docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/16351989319067-GDPR-Compliance-Overview?_gl=1*1jmgyor*_ga*MTI1MTg0Mjk0LjE3MjU5MDI3MzI.*_ga_M18GBY4NJ0*MTczMDM3ODczMC4xNC4xLjE3MzAzODMxNTMuNjAuMC4w)

Can I upload and store content in Memberstack for my members to access?

Other

What if I'd like to email your team with a question, idea, or feedback?

**You can email us at support \[at\] memberstack \[dot\] com.** Please note that for support queries relating to using Memberstack, we recommend posting on our [community](https://docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/community/posts). Paying customers can also reaching us through a chat widget in the application.

Slack

### Still have questions? Ask away in our 5,500+ member Slack community! 🙌

Join the Memberstack community Slack and ask away! Expect a prompt reply from a team member, a Memberstack expert, or a fellow community member.

[Join our Slack](https://www.memberstack.com/slack)

100% free trial — try out all features for an unlimited time. Only pay when you're ready to launch and accept members on your website. Pricing plans starting at $25 and onwards.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a free tier and discounts for specific groups like non-profits and young professionals.
